ZT2Strings.LOC_STRING: Sugar Shock is now active for young guests!
Sugar Shock is no longer active for young guests.
Caffeine Craze is now active for adult guests!
Caffeine Craze is no longer active for adult guests.
Caffeine Craze is now active for zoo staff!
Caffeine Craze is no longer active for zoo staff.
One of your animals is diseased! Go to the Extinct Research Lab to find a cure.
You found the cure to the disease! Walk up to your animals and press SPACEBAR to cure them.
You received a reward of %m for finding the cure to the disease!
